com.github.dbadia.sqrl.server

Class SqrlConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dbadia.sqrl.server.SqrlConfig

  • public class SqrlConfig
extends Object
    Bean which stores our server-side SQRL configuration settings.

    Requiredfields to be set are:

    • aesKeyBytes -
    • backchannelServletPath

    Recommended fields to be set are: All other fields are optional with sensible defaults

    Author:
    Dave Badia

      • setBackchannelServletPath

        public void setBackchannelServletPath(String backchannelServletPath)
        Required: sets the URL to the servlet endpoint which will handle SQRL client requests, can be either a full URL, a full URI, or a partial URI.

        SettingLogin URLComputed BC url
        https://sqrljava.tech/sqrlexample/sqrlbchttps://sqrljava.tech/sqrlexample/loginhttps://sqrljava.tech/sqrlexample/sqrlbc
        /sqrl/sqrlbchttps://sqrljava.tech/myapp/loginhttps://sqrljava.tech/sqrl/sqrlbc
        sqrlbchttps://sqrljava.tech/sqrlexample/loginhttps://sqrljava.tech/sqrlexample/sqrlbc
        Parameters:
        backchannelServletPath - the servlet endpoint which will handle SQRL client requests. Can be a full URL, a full URI, or a partial URI
